sentence:
• salesforce.com inc.'s CRM shares rose 1.9% after posting fiscal first-quarter 2019 earnings of $0.52 per share, beating the Zacks Consensus Estimate of $0.18
• HP Inc. HPQ increased 4% after reporting fiscal second-quarter 2018 revenues of $14,003 million, surpassing the Zacks Consensus Estimate of $13,585 million
• Dick's Sporting Goods Inc.'s DKS shares surged 25.8% after posting fiscal first quarter 2018 earnings of $0.59 per share, outpacing the Zacks Consensus Estimate of $0.42
• Shares of Michael Kors Holdings Ltd. KORS plunged 11.5% after projecting fiscal 2019 earnings per share in the range of $4.65--$4.75, below the Zacks Consensus Estimate of $4.78
